name: Ghostbusters: Sanctum of Slime
summary: Strap on your proton packs for an all-new Ghostbusting adventure! Ectoplasmic threats are spawning all over New York, and only you and your team of rookie Ghostbusters can stop them. Choose from 4 new playable characters. Hop in the all-new ECTO-4WD and blast your foes with a medley of destructive weapons. Battle against the hordes of evil entities alone or with a team of friends through local or online multiplayer co-op. Show them you ain’t afraid of no ghosts!

esrb.synopsis: This is an adventure game in which players assume the role of a rookie Ghostbuster who must help save New York City from rogue spirits. From a top-down perspective, players navigate through "haunted" city environments and fire electric beams to drain ghosts' energy bars; defeated enemies dissipate into the air amid bursts of light. Ghostbusters grunt or cry out when struck by objects (e.g., luggage, floating skulls); injured characters collapse to the ground when defeated.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards human characters - Violence in a sporting context
This game allows the player to interact with other players ONLINE
